Review.Titre: Wow!!
Review.Contenu: Wow!!You want to know my experience through Unity Wireless? Here you go… I signed up for the Acp program for the tablet with unlimited data but received a SIM card instead, so I figured OK the SIM card is supposed to go into the tablet, so I’ll waited for the tablet to arrive. The tablet never arrived, so I gave support a call. I was informed that I didn’t qualify for the tablet because I hadn’t paid for the tablet, (Miind you it advertises free tablet with unlimited data through the ACP program.)so I said OK I’ll pay for the tablet. They then sent me an invoice through my account with them, to pay for the tablet. Then came the waiting game for the tablet to arrive. I was so excited. I figured this would fix Everything. I was wrong. Once it arrived, I noticed, that the tablet I received was not the tablet that was advertised on their website. The tablet advertised already had the data applied to it, there was no Sim card needed. the tablet I received, however, was called “My Tab Pro.”But I gave them the benefit of the doubt I placed the sim card inside the tablet, only to have nothing happened. It kept telling me that I had no data, so I gave support a call, letting them know what I was experiencing with the tablet, and was told “we apologize. That was our fault. The tablet was not activated. If you’ll turn it off for 10 minutes and then turn it back on it should be fine”,so I did so. When I turned it back on and tried to use it, I still received the same message that I had no data.  I gave support yet another call letting them know what I was experiencing with the tablet, this time I was told to turn it off for 30 minutes. Only what they didn’t know is I already turned it off for 30 minutes and it still had not   worked. I knew it was not going to work. And so I called them back yet again but this time I was told shut it off again for a longer period of time and it should work, but please do not contact us through phone anymore contact us through the website. I’m thinking to myself. What is the phone number on there for, if we’re not to contact you through it? So now, here I am  stuck with a Sim card and a tablet but they’re charging I guess ACP for something that’s not even being used. And it’s my understanding that if you don’t use that Sim card you lose your ACP but you’re still charged by the company that you’re going through? so how do I get rid of this garbage? This is so not worth stress and that’s exactly what it’s giving me stress.

Review.Titre: Keep Looking - This ain't the answer!
Review.Contenu: At best? Incomplete information in advertising. At worst? They just straight up lie. $15 smart, branded tablet - they said. UNLIMITED talk, text & data - they said.The reality is...1. $15 is accurate. 2. Smart? Jury's still out. My son works in an I.T. department and we'll begin day 3 of trying to set this thing up tomorrow. 3. Branded? With a name no one knows.4. Unlimited? Talk & text?...apparently so. Data? 3 GB worth per month. After that, dial-up speed.Now, they're kind enough to sell you data at $10/GB. If I can afford that, I'm not qualifying for this thing. 5. The battery on this tablet drains exactly 3 times as fast as my OLD Samsung.Bottom line...talk & text may be OK. But if you need data connectivity, this is not the answer.
